BBEX3.M.RSD.USD.CA.AA.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Serbia  / USD 1 = RSD ... (buying)

General: * Independent since 3 June 2006; formerly "Serbia and Montenegro". The euro has been the sole legal tender in Montenegro since 1 April 2002. On 25 October 2006, the ISO code was changed from CSD to RSD.
